Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey sustained a severe injury to his lower left leg in the fourth quarter of Detroit's victory over the Orlando Magic
Post-Match Reflections: Pistons coach J.B. Bickerstaff said it is tough for all of them and that Ivey is a great teammate and no one cares more about this than he does
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaden Ivey led the Pistons with 22 points in the 105-96 victory over the Orlando Magic
Others: Cole Anthony slipped and fell into Ivey's planted leg, knocking Ivey to the floor
